title: 题解 CF870A 【Search for Pretty Integers】

name: B_lhx
title: 题解 CF870A 【Search for Pretty Integers】

content:
# 来，让我们欢快的使用集合！

详见代码，一个并集解决一切·=·

```python
n, m = map(int, input().split())
a = set(map(int, input().split()))
b = set(map(int, input().split()))
c = min(a)
d = min(b)
e = a & b
if len(e) != 0:
    print(min(e))
else:
    print(str(min(c, d)) + str(max(c, d)))

```
